content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Regular pay is based on a forty (40) hour work week. Overtime hours are not compensated either by salary or time off in lieu, as per the relevant provincial Employment Standards.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PAY CYCLE/PERIOD\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Canada provides twenty-four (24) semi-monthly pay periods during the fiscal year. Payroll is processed on the 15\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and last day (30\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or 31\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"st\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") of the month. Should these days land on a weekend or statutory holiday, your pay will be distributed on the business day prior to the weekend or statutory holiday. Employees are paid for time worked up to and including the payday.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DIRECT DEPOSIT\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Payment is deposited directly into your bank account (for EPAM Canada's pay schedule please see “Pay Cycle/Period”). To set up direct deposit, a void cheque or a completed direct deposit form from your financial institution must be submitted to HR upon hire. Changes to your direct deposit account may happen at any time as long as you provide account change information to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAHRCA@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Human Resource CA\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" at least eight (8) business days prior to pay day.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ACCESSING YOUR PAYSTUB\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can download a copy of your pay slip via ADP's Statement Self Service portal (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://my.adp.ca/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"my.adp.ca\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") at the end of each pay period. deposited.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"REGISTERING TO ACCESS YOUR PAY\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Canada is required by law to make certain deductions from your pay each time one is issued. Among these are your federal and provincial income taxes and your contribution to Social Programs as required by law (i.e., employment insurance, provincial healthcare taxes, federal/provincial pension plans, taxable benefits, etc.). These deductions will be itemized on your pay slip. The amount of the deductions may depend on your earnings and on the information you provide on your federal and provincial tax forms.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to ensure the proper credits for tax purposes are made, any changes in name, address, telephone number, marital status, number of dependents, or number of exemptions must be reported to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAHRCA@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Human Resource CA\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WAGE ASSIGNMENTS (GARNISHMENTS)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Canada must execute any court-ordered wage assignment or garnishment against your wages. However, whenever court-ordered deductions are to be taken from your pay, you will be notified in writing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ERRORS IN PAY\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every effort is made to avoid errors in your pay.
